info.label: Software Developer
info.brief: As a 5-year experience developer, infrastructure builder, and security expert, Jie-Ren Shih is experienced in building secure, high scalability, and high availability enterprise product. With experience of hosting container-based and serverless web service on AWS, he is an expert in DevOps process from developing, testing, opertaion, and monitoring modern web service. Jie-Ren is also familiar with cloud related technologies including AWS, kubernetes, docker, and serverless architecture
